Class StudentAnswers

  • public class StudentAnswers
extends java.lang.Object
    Objective representation of student's answers
    Author:
    Paul Alves

    • Constructor Detail

      • StudentAnswers

        public StudentAnswers(java.lang.String user,
              java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> ans,
              int pd)
        Constructs a StudentAnswers object
        Parameters:
        user - The user name of this student
        ans - The answers this student has chosen as an ArrayList of String arrays, with the first index being the answer,and the second being the question type.
        pd - The period of this student

      • StudentAnswers

        public StudentAnswers(java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String[]> a)
        Constructs a StudentAnswers object to be used as the answer key.
        Parameters:
        a - The correct answers
